creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed: in brown ink, lower center: New=York- Apres l'Orage- After the Storm. | Exposition au Century Club. | Winslow Homer, NA.

makers.displaydate: 1836–1910; born Boston, MA; died Prouts Neck, ME
makers.displaymaker: Winslow Homer, 1836–1910; born Boston, MA; died Prouts Neck, ME

texts.textentryhtml: Earl Shinn (who probably added the inscription), 1883(?)-1886; bequest to Richard T. Cadbury, Philadelphia (his nephew); bequest to Mrs. Leah Cadbury Furtmueller (his daughter), 1929; gift to Mrs. Henry J. Cadbury, Cambridge, Mass. (her cousin); purchased by the donor, 1947
